body.name: Mattel Disney Pixar Lightyear XL-03 Buzz Lightyear Figure, Authentic Action Figure 5 Inches Tall with 12 Posable Joints & Accessory, Gift 4 Years & Up
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 23 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 22 hrs 59 mins
features: Relive the excitement of space exploration, conflict and teamwork of Disney Pixar's Lightyear, with this authentic, detailed figure representing Buzz Lightyear as the XL-03 pilot from early in his origin story
Recreate scenes from the thrilling animated adventure or imagine new ones. At 5 in tall, this action figure has 12 movable joints for dynamic posing!

Blast off on an important early space mission or face the harsh environment of the T'Kani Prime planet with this XL-03 Buzz Lightyear, designed with true-to-movie detail, removable helmet and flare gun
Fans will want to collect the whole Lightyear team for a spectacular display. Vehicles are also available. Each item sold separately, subject to availability
Makes an exciting movie-themed gift for action figure enthusiasts and Lightyear fans ages 4 years old and up
body.description: Discover Disney and Pixar's Lightyear. Stranded on an uncharted planet, Buzz Lightyear and his crewmates will need to battle hostile plants, giant bugs and the ultimate threat, Zurg, to complete their mission and return home. This action figure represents Buzz during one of his earliest missions for Star Command in the thrilling animated adventure. This detailed, posable figure will inspire creative space ranger play or a spectacular display. At 5 inches tall, this movie-authentic figure has 12 movable joints to recreate all his signature poses. The XL-03 Buzz comes with a removable helmet and a flare gun that snaps onto his hip or into his hand, ready to send out emergency signals to his teammates. Colors, dimensions and decorations may vary.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: The Thrill of Disney and Pixar’s Lightyear With figures, vehicles and more from Mattel, kids of all ages can relive the adventures of Buzz and his team as they survive a hostile planet and face fierce foes.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Adorable Buzz Lightyear!!
reviews.reviewText: Great price for a great well loved character. This will be gifted in an OCC shoebox for a little boy. Seems sturdy enough for little hands to play with....over & over again!

reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Smaller than I thought
reviews.reviewText: Although I believe the child who receives this toy in their Operation Christmas Child shoebox will treasure it, it is smaller than I expected.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great replacement for the big ship
reviews.reviewText: My son got the big Lightyear ship with a Buzz for Christmas and he broke the leg off of that one within minutes of palying with it. I tried superglue, but that wasn't holding up against a 4 year old. I was looking for a replacement and my son fell in love with this one (he likes his suit and the tiny gun). He fits perfectly in the ship and I'm thrilled to see him happy. We've had this one for a month and so far he's held up great, and he goes everywhere with us. Funny enough he's probably my son's very favorite toy from Christmas.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on March 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My little boy loved this when it came. Have nothing negative to say about it.

reviews.reviewTitle: Maja figura de calidad y de marca pero queee podría tener algo más de movilidad.
reviews.reviewText: Otra figura más de la serie Lightyear en 12cm.Sigue la misma línea de movilidad y de diseño que las demás pero en otro color, como podemos ver, AZUL ;)Del 1 al 10 le doy un 8, que está muy bien ;) No le doy más por el tema de la movilidad algo ajustada a estas alturas en figuras de 12cm. pero supongo que para los peques es suficiente ;)Llegó en su blister ya conocido por las otras figuras de la serie, sin daños, dentro de un sobre acartonado.Todo bien :D GRACIAS AMAZON :)La recomiendo...si la ves por menos de 13 euros ;)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 8, 2023
reviews.reviewText: For the price I was not expecting too much but I was very surprised this is a very good quality figure beautifully painted and has details.All the joints are articulated a lot better than more expensive figures I have seen so you can easily use this for toy photography or just as a toy for kids

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is a great buzz lightyear toy, nice and robust and great for playing with for boisterous kids!! Good value and makes a great gift!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 2, 2022
reviews.reviewText: Disney Pixar's first Toy Story film was released in 1995 - which is when lantern-jawed, blue eyed boy Buzz Lightyear first made his appearance. Since then, he's come a long way and starred in his own film and TV series.If this version of Buzz - named after US astronaut Buzz Aldrin - seems a little unfamiliar, as he was to me, that's because he's ventured into prequel territory. This articulated 5" tall figure represents an early version of Buzz - the XL-03 pilot.For a small figure, this Buzz has considerable play value. Not only are there 12 moveable joints to put him in a range of poses, his helmet and flare gun are removable - and the gun can be placed in his hand or can snap onto his hip. The toy's suggested age range is 4+ which I assume may be because the gun may be swallowed and even the helmet could be put in the mouth.As you'd expect from Mattel, this action figure is well made, superbly detailed and should prove durable whatever adventures he gets taken on. He'll stand up without support so could be displayed effectively too. Well presented and very popular, he'd make the perfect stocking filler for Lightyear fans.
